channel.title: Cheat Client Proof [Please Help]
channel.description: [size=20pt][shadow=grey,left]Im working on a server so far so good, but I want to make it cheat client proof so far i spawned object client sided around my server so that u have to have my client to see it but now i want to make it so that i can spawn npc client sided so u need my client to play my game. And my question is: [/shadow][shadow=red,left]"Is there a method out there to spawn npc client sided?"[/shadow] [/size]

item.title: Cheat Client Proof [Please Help]
item.dc:creator: @Ceo123 Ceo123
item.description:
@Ceo123 wrote:

[size=14pt]IM CHANGING THE UID[/size]

If (c.player != c.help) { c.theirRespect -= 1; }

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client Proof [Please Help]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Ceo123:

Because i want people to login with cheat client, if they od it spams the website “Two Girls One Cup” 101 Time :]

Sigh, you’re stupid. No offense.
That’s literally impossible, because opening a webpage requires client-sided code.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client Proof [Please Help]
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

Why don’t you just block cheat clients? Make it to where you have to have the client to log in.

Read full topic
